name: 李老师不是你老师
content: How to do film reviews safely in the country:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I was also quite shocked when I saw this exam question. I thought this kind of debate was just on the Internet, but I didn't expect it to be a question on the exam paper.
This may not be difficult to understand the current younger pink group - they just changed the place to do the exam paper on the Internet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Paper released a report on the investigation of the press conference of the Hu Xinyu incident.
The article lists the course of events and the scene, as well as the autopsy, psychological characterization and audio recording identification.
The article states that the autopsy results are consistent with the characteristics of suicide, and the psychological characterization of the person shows serious psychological problems before the suicide. He also recorded two audio recordings at 17:40 and 23:08 on October 14 to express his suicidal intention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Now, do you agree with the announcement at the official press conference on February 2 that Hu Xinyu committed suicide by hanging?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contributions
Comments on topics related to Hu Xinyu on B station

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The current methods used by high schools to prevent students from having psychological problems:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Interestingly, parents have always demonized video games, believing that they harm their children's mental health.
But in fact, a good game often teaches you how to love others, love everything around you, how to establish correct universal values and encourage you to pursue your own ideals.
On the contrary, many questions in textbooks and test papers have been distorted to the point of being inhuman.
